easyclimate: Easy Access to High-Resolution Daily Climate Data for Europe

Source: R/easyclimate-package.R
easyclimate-package.Rd

Get high-resolution (1 km) daily climate data (precipitation, minimum and maximum temperatures) for points and polygons within Europe.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/VeruGHub/easyclimate

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/VeruGHub/easyclimate/issues
